name: Landing page with sign up form
description:
Buzzy lets you build working apps straight from Figma.


This is an example landing page design including a working sign up form that has been marked up with the Buzzy Figma plugin - see a live version here.


It also demonstrates some handy layout techniques with the Buzzy plugin, including a full screen background image, responsive content with min/max widths, a footer that pins to the bottom of the viewport but still respects the content above it in terms of scroll, and a horizontal form that automatically wraps when it hits small screen sizes.


Grab this file, install the plugin and hit publish - hey presto, you have a working app in a browser. Use this file as a reference for creating and publishing your own data-driven apps using Buzzy, directly from Figma.
